hero.subtext: UI/UX Product Designer & UI Developer — 20+ years — Frontend across Angular/React/Next, Design Systems, Data-dense UIs
hero.description: Bridging UX strategy and production-grade frontend for 20+ years. I create data-dense enterprise experiences and consumer apps that scale across teams and time.

capabilities.title: UX/UI Design
capabilities.description: Research, IA, Wireframes, Prototypes, Design Systems

about.title: About Me
introduction: I'm Rajesh Kumar, a UI/UX Product Designer and UI Developer with over 20 years of experience crafting digital experiences that users love and businesses value. I bridge the gap between design strategy and production-grade code, ensuring products are not just beautiful, but performant, accessible, and engineered to scale.

My unique dual expertise in design and frontend development allows me to think holistically about problems. I understand the constraints and possibilities of implementation, which informs smarter, more feasible design decisions. I've worked across enterprise SaaS, fintech, healthcare, e-commerce, and consumer products, always focused on measurable outcomes.

I specialize in complex, data-dense interfaces where clarity and usability are critical. Whether it's building design systems that unify product teams, architecting information hierarchies for enterprise platforms, or optimizing mobile experiences for millions of users, I bring systematic thinking and craft to every project.

principles.title: Users First, Always
principles.description: Every design decision starts with deep user understanding. I validate assumptions through research and testing, never guesswork.

principles.title: Systems Over Screens
principles.description: I design scalable systems, not just interfaces. Components, patterns, and principles that grow with your product and team.

principles.title: Outcomes Over Output
principles.description: Beautiful interfaces are table stakes. I measure success through user outcomes, business KPIs, and measurable impact.

principles.title: Design for Engineering
principles.description: My code background informs every design. I create feasible, performant solutions that engineers love to build.

principles.title: Continuous Learning
principles.description: Technology evolves rapidly. I stay current with emerging patterns, tools, and best practices to deliver modern solutions.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: A selection of projects spanning enterprise applications, consumer products, design systems, and brand campaigns.

contact.title: Let's Work Together
contact.description: Available for freelance projects, consulting, and full-time opportunities. Let's discuss how I can help bring your vision to life.
contact.formDescription: I typically respond within 24 hours on business days.
contact.availabilityMessage: Open to new opportunities starting Q1 2025. Currently accepting freelance projects with flexible timelines.
contact.ctaDescription: Whether you're a startup looking to build your MVP or an enterprise modernizing your platform, I bring the strategic thinking and technical expertise to make it happen.
